locale.message: This plugin provides rendering support for HTML Article Galleys.
Customize the display of HTML Galleys.

A HTML Galley may be displayed directly in the site inline, or via an iframe. The iframe will use a minimal header and footer and will maximize the presentation of the content. Displaying the article inline will merge the body of the article with the body of the site.
Display the HTML Galley inline, rather than via an iframe.
